wordpressPost.title: 2008-2016 Teaching in Guadeloupe – French West Indies
wordpressPost.content:
• Taught social medias impact awareness and other internet related skills in middle school and in high school.
  • Led different projects to help promote innovation in the schools and empower students as young adults.
    E.g: Organize forums and environmental awareness actions
    E.g : Create and run a innovative company called VéliSorbet.
